name: subseries
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a number or set of similar or related things within a larger number or set of things: This collection is arranged into five series, four of which have been further arranged into subseries. It is a time series in which each 12-month period represents a sub-series.
More examplesFewer examplesThis book is part of a subseries of the author's collected writings.Include the title of the main series followed by the title of the subseries in your work. This second book in the subseries is, in my opinion, better than the first.
